title: Movie star cartoons
brief_description: A selection of previews and cartoons featuring many famous Hollywood movie stars and entertainers in animation, including Cary Grant, Humphrey Bogart, Greta Garbo, Jack Benny, Lenny Bruce, Amos and Andy and many others. Includes works by directors Friz Freleng and Tex Avery. Entertainment for all the family. Quality is inconsistent due to age and condition of some of the cartoons.
